DOC.brief_title: Supraclavicular Block v Retroclavicular Block : Incidence Phrenic Nerve Paralysis
DOC.detailed_description: To date , study compare clinically retroclavicular brachial plexus block supraclavicular brachial plexus block brachial plexus block . The aim study evaluate difference ultrasound guide supraclavicular versus retroclavicular brachial plexus block , primary focus incidence diminish ipsilateral hemidiaphramatic excursion ( ipsilateral phrenic nerve blockade ) . We also evaluate difference two technique success produce surgical anesthesia , procedural time perform block ( include image time needling time ) , block onset time , ease quality ultrasound needle visualization , incidence paresthesia , vascular puncture pneumothorax . Lastly , observe compare distribution motor sensory blockade two technique
